purpleculture_pinyin:
yùn
to accumulate; to hold in store; to contain; to gather together; to collect; depth; inner strength; profundity
накапливать; держать в запасе; содержать; собираться вместе; собирать; глубина; внутренняя сила; глубина
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 蕴)
Pictophonetic: 縕 indicates the sound; 艹 (plant) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
蘊藏 [ yùn cáng ]: to hold in store; to contain (untapped reserves etc)
蘊含 [ yùn hán ]: to contain; to accumulate
蘊涵 [ yùn hán ]: to contain; to accumulate; to embrace; implicit condition; implication; entailment
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 縕 [ yūn ] tangled hemp, raveled silk; vague, confused
heisig_chinese_memo: It's known by few that Spidey actually did some time as a prisoner and spent his time amassing skills in flower decoration and cooking exotic dishes.
Ru_trainchinese: yùn: (графема) (книжн.) заключать в себе, содержать; накапливать; глубина
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spidey likes to amass his energy again relaxing in the sun with a tasty dish and the smell of flowers.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "艸", "縕" sound. This is "薀", which means accumulation. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The Ten Years of Zhao Gong": "Yun Li has sins, my aunt has no Yun!" "Confucius's Family Talk. Entering the Officialdom": "It's not separation from above and below, Taoism and flow without accumulation." Wang Su's note: "Accumulation, stagnation."

" Yun " also means to contain and contain. Such as "Selected Works. Shen Xiuwen "Inscription of King Luzhao of Qi Gu'an": "The Qi is full of wind and cloud, and he bears the sun and the moon." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty "The Great Bell of Huacheng Temple": "There are few talents, strong and successful."

" Yun " means depression. Such as "Hou Han Shu. Wang Chong Wang Fu Zhong Chang Tong Biography": "(Wang Fu) has an indignation, and he wrote more than 30 books in seclusion. It was a ridicule of his losses at the time and did not want to show his name. Therefore, the title is "The Latent Man"." New language. "Sorrow for the Passing": "The deed is gone, there is no reward for speaking, the center is accumulated, and the rest is dead!"

" Aggregate " also expresses the profoundness of things or truths. Such as "New Tang Book. "Wei Wei Biography": "Zheng is also self-exposure to the world. It is the exhibition of the foundation without any hidden. When there are more than two hundred plays, all those who are the emperor's heart." Northern Song Wang Anshi "Answer to Han Qiuren's Letter": "Ask for Humanity Those who ask about the Yi are not yet the connotations of the Yi."
humanum_short_description_en: From "艸", "縕" sound. This is "薀", which means accumulation.
humanum_full_description:
從「艸」，「縕」聲。本作「薀」，表示積聚。如《左傳．昭公十年》：「蘊利生孽，姑使無蘊乎！」《孔子家語．入官》：「是以上下親而不離，道化流而不蘊。」王肅注：「蘊，滯積也。」

　　「蘊」也表示包含、包藏。如《文選．沈休文〈齊故安陸昭王碑文〉》：「氣蘊風雲，身負日月。」唐代李白〈化城寺大鐘銘〉：「少蘊才略，壯而有成。」

　　「蘊」表示鬱結。如《後漢書．王充王符仲長統列傳》：「（王符）志意蘊憤，乃隱居著書三十餘篇，以譏當時失得，不欲章顯其名，故號曰《潛夫論》。」《世說新語．傷逝》：「冥契既逝，發言莫賞，中心蘊結，余其亡矣！」

　　「蘊」還表示事物或道理的深奧之處。如《新唐書．魏微傳》：「徵亦自以不世遇，乃展盡底蘊無所隱，凡二百餘奏，無不剴切當帝心者。」北宋王安石〈答韓求仁書〉：「求仁所問於《易》者，尚非《易》之蘊也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「艸」，「縕」聲。本作「薀」，表示積聚。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
蘊 (Simplified: 蕴)
Pinyin: yùn
English Definition: to accumulate; to hold in store; to contain; to gather together; to collect; depth; inner strength; profundity
Total strokes: 19; Radical: 艸
Pictophonetic: 縕 indicates the sound; 艹 (plant) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 縕 [ yūn ] tangled hemp, raveled silk; vague, confused
Example Words:
蘊藏 [ yùn cáng ]: to hold in store; to contain (untapped reserves etc)
蘊含 [ yùn hán ]: to contain; to accumulate
蘊涵 [ yùn hán ]: to contain; to accumulate; to embrace; implicit condition; implication; entailment
More: 蘊* | *蘊 | *蘊*

Kind: traditional
